Package au.csiro.pathling.views

Class FhirView

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.views.FhirView
@UniqueColumnNames public class FhirView extends Object
View definitions are the heart of this proposal. In a nutshell, view is tabular projection of a FHIR resource, where the columns and criteria are defined by FHIRPath expressions. This is defined in a simple JSON document for ease of use and to iterate quickly, but future iterations may shift to defining views as true FHIR resources.
Author:
John Grimes
